Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is able to construct feedback in an incredibly constructive manner, with step by step instructions for improvement and you can ask for further feedback if needed in a timely way that you can't get from your teacher. Furthermore GenAI draws its information from a more up to date and wide source than a teacher and this is best for most up to date learning.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback was generally more neutral or positive from GenAI than my teacher which made me feel more capable of achieving the task
